synopsis.native: Mateo vive con su madre, Libertad, en un mundo color de rosa; un microcosmos que tiene precisamente dos habitantes, madre e hijo. Un día a Mateo le diagnostican cáncer…
synopsis.english: Follows the toxic relationship between a mother and her son, drawing a parallel between the dictatorship in North Korea and the people.
